title: Volume of a Cylinder
description: Calculate the volume of a cylinder given its radius and height.

title: Pythagorean Theorem
description: Given the lengths of two sides of a right triangle, find the length of the third side.

title: Basic Probability
description: What is the probability of flipping a fair coin and getting heads?

title: Combination Calculation
description: How many ways can you choose 3 items from a set of 7?

title: Simple Interest
description: Calculate the simple interest earned on an investment of $1000 at an annual rate of 5% over 3 years.

title: Exponential Growth
description: If a population doubles every 5 years, how large will it be in 20 years if it starts at 100?

title: Logarithmic Equations
description: Solve for x: log2(x) + log2(x - 2) = 3.

title: Derivative Calculation
description: Find the derivative of f(x) = 3x^2 + 2x - 5.

title: Integral Problem
description: Calculate the integral of f(x) = x^3 from x=1 to x=4.

title: Statistical Means
description: Find the mean of the following set of numbers: 2, 3, 7, 10, 15.

title: Simple Addition
description: What is 5 + 7?

title: Square Roots
description: Find the square root of 144.

title: Algebraic Simplification
description: Simplify the expression: 3x - 2x + 4.

title: Quadratic Formula
description: Solve for x: x^2 - 5x + 6 = 0.

title: Circle Circumference
description: Calculate the circumference of a circle with radius 4cm.

title: Volume of Sphere
description: Find the volume of a sphere with a radius of 3 meters.

title: Differentiation
description: Differentiate f(x) = x^3 + 2x^2 - x + 1.

title: Integration
description: Integrate f(x) = 2x^2 - 3x + 4 over the interval [0,1].

title: Probability of Dice
description: What is the probability of rolling a sum of 7 with two dice?

title: Statistical Variance
description: Calculate the variance for the data set: 3, 7, 7, 19.
